content:
Hello all! :wave: I'm Will (pierwill on github), a technical writer and recovering academic (in English literature of all things). Been doing technical things for a few years now but never really thought I liked programming or programming languages as suchâ€”until I started learning Rust!

I've been strangely drawn to rustc and its magic, and have started to submit some docs PRs as I try to grasp bits here and there. Looking forward to chatting with y'all and contributing !
